argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ndxarg.1 | |- E = Slot N |
| 2 |  | ndxarg.2 | |- N e. NN |
| 3 |  | #P_df-ndx | |- ndx = ( _I |` NN ) |
| 4 |  | #P_nnex | |- NN e. _V |
| 5 |  | #P_resiexg | |- ( NN e. _V -> ( _I |` NN ) e. _V ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( _I |` NN ) e. _V |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_eqeltri | |- ndx e. _V |
| 8 | 7, 1 | #P_strfvn | |- ( E ` ndx ) = ( ndx ` N ) |
| 9 | 3 | #P_fveq1i | |- ( ndx ` N ) = ( ( _I |` NN ) ` N ) |
| 10 |  | #P_fvresi | |- ( N e. NN -> ( ( _I |` NN ) ` N ) = N ) |
| 11 | 2, 10 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( ( _I |` NN ) ` N ) = N |
| 12 | 8, 9, 11 | #P_3eqtri | |- ( E ` ndx ) = N |
